Name: Sorrel Rum Punch
Ingredients: 30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Review: This drink harnesses the flavour of sorrelade and combines it with the traditional strength and bitter sweetness of rum punch. Jamaica in a glass.
History: A classic Jamaican punch using the classic proportions of 'one of sour, two of sweet, three of strong and four of weak.'
Nutrition: One serving of Sorrel Rum Punch contains 297 calories
